metadata.synopsis: When you get near the dead cultist, this will play. We've just seen the gith kill this one and take the other captive cultists inside. The player ponders whether this works in their favour or against and establishes that the gith don't like the cultists either.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go near the body of the cultist left outside of the monastery.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: So the githyanki aren't fond of the cultists. Could be a good thing.
